text: Megophrys robusta, commonly known as the Bengal spadefoot toad, robust spadefoot toad, or white-lipped horned toad, is a species of toad found in eastern Nepal and north-eastern India. It is associated with riparian vegetation in tropical moist forests. ==References== Category:Megophrys Category:Frogs of India Category:Amphibians of Nepal Category:Amphibians described in 1908
title: Megophrys robusta
